title: A Marriage Fable
description: A modern twist on A Christmas Carol, A MARRIAGE FABLE is a novella of a typical, modern-day husband nearing his 20th wedding anniversary, and the powerful genie that inspires him to be a better man.“A Marriage Fable does for Valentine's Day what A Christmas Carol did for Christmas Day. A Must Read romantic fantasy!”--BJ Fera, Goodreads
author: J. Cafesin
